summary.span: 为所有 元素提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for all elements.

summary.span: 使用 元素放置和排列 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的子对象。

span.span: Use elements to position and arrange child objects in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含一套对象，后者是在属性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 添加子级到隐式将其添加到为元素。Adding a child to a implicitly adds it to the for the element. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供一套综合的派生实现中，启用许多复杂的布局。 provides a comprehensive suite of derived implementations, enabling many complex layouts. 如果你想要实现新布局容器，使用和方法。If you want to implement new layout containers, use the and methods. 有关如何使用这些方法的演示，请参阅[创建自定义内容换行面板示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979)。For a demonstration of how to use these methods, see [Create a Custom Content-Wrapping Panel Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979). 如果元素不接收鼠标或触笔事件未定义。 elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a is not defined. 如果你需要处理鼠标或触笔事件，但不是希望的背景你，使用。If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your , use . 默认情况下，面板元素不接收焦点。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要强制要接收焦点的面板元素，将设置属性`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来添加两个对象添加到。The following example shows how to use the property to add two objects to a . [!code-xaml[StackPanel_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StackPanel_snip/CS/StackPanelExample.xaml#stackpanelexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[Stackpanel_Procedural_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Stackpanel_Procedural_snip/CSharp/StackpanelExample.cs#stackpanelexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[Stackpanel_Procedural_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Stackpanel_Procedural_snip/visualbasic/stackpanelexample.vb#stackpanelexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法将数据绑定到此属性。You cannot bind data to this property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例使用创建水平。The following example uses a to create a horizontal . 水平内指定。The horizontal is specified within the . 属性设置为`true`上，指示应将生成的项放在面板中。The property is set to `true` on the , which indicates that the generated items should be placed in the panel. 当这种方式，指定无法由该控件的用户不使用的情况下替换。When you specify it this way, the cannot be replaced by the user of the control without using a . 因此，执行此操作仅当你知道你不希望替换而不使用模板的面板。Therefore, do this only if you know that you do not want the panel to be replaced without the use of a template. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#ListBoxCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#listboxct)] 或者，您可以设置属性。Alternatively, you can set the property. 下面的示例设置中的。The following example sets the in a of a . summary.span: 设置给定元素的 附加属性的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property for a given element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 较大的一个`value`的给定`element`、 越有可能`element`要显示在前台。The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground. 同样，如果`element`具有相对较低`value`、`element`可能会在后台中。Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background. 例如，`element`具有`value`的 5 将出现上面`element`具有`value`(4)，这反过来将出现上面`element`，其值为 3，依次类推。For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on. 允许使用负值，并将不断此优先顺序模式。Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern. 成员集合中具有相等值呈现可视化树中出现的顺序。Members of a collection that have equal values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree. 你可以确定通过循环访问的成员的子级的索引位置集合。You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示在代码中如何设置的值属性 (通过使用方法)。The following example demonstrates in code how to set the value of the property (by using the method). [!code-cpp[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/CPP/CanvasZ-Order.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/Csharp/CanvasZ-Order.cs#2)] [!code-vb[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/VisualBasic/CanvasZ-Order.vb#2)]
